LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= various men, possibly the same person; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, returned from exile
= man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite who married a foreign wife
= man; ► participant in dedication of post-exilic temple
= man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>} and trumpeter, participating in dedication of post-exilic temple
